text: Igor Zubrilin (born March 20, 1976 in Astana) is a Kazakhstani cross-country skier. He competed at the Winter Olympics in 2002 in Salt Lake City, in the 15 km and in the 50 km. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Kazakhstani male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross- country skiers of Kazakhstan Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in cross-country skiing Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1999 Asian Winter Games Category:Cross- country skiers at the 2003 Asian Winter Games Category:Sportspeople from Nur- Sultan Category:People from Nur-Sultan Category:Medalists at the 1999 Asian Winter Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Kazakhstan
title: Igor Zubrilin
